org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.transactions.specific.job

Class RecordingJob<EventAtom>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.api.Job<EventAtom>
      • org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.api.CompositeJob<EventAtom>
        • org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.transactions.specific.job.RecordingJob<EventAtom>

  • public class RecordingJob<EventAtom>
extends org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.api.CompositeJob<EventAtom>
    A stateless job implementation that executes its action inside a RecordingCommand if there is a TransactionalEditingDomain available.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RecordingJob.RecordingJobContextData
      Data transfer class for storing the commands created by recording jobs.

      • findDomainTarget

        protected java.lang.Object findDomainTarget(org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.api.Activation<? extends EventAtom> activation,
                                org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.api.Context context)
        This method is used to find a target that can be used for getting the TransactionalEditingDomain. It tries to retrieve the domain from the context, otherwise it tries to find an EObject parameter in the event atom of the activation.
        Parameters:
        activation -
        context -
        Returns:
        the object to be used for finding the domain
